channel.title: Road2 on Alon Talmi's Portfolio

item.title: Spacetaurant
item.description: --- Spacetaurant is a mobile, casual idle, sandbox-y game about running a futuristic and cute restaurant on a intergalactic highway. You play as the owner of the restaurant, you need to collect and grow ingredients and make sure all your customers leave your restaurant satisfied and hopefully leave you a good review. Spacetaurant was part of R2G - a game development acceleration program. R2G was created by a collaboration between:
